text: Tuhan peumanyang langet tan tameh Takalon sideh manyang sileupah Lheuh nyan kuasa Neuh ban hajat droe Neupiyoh keudroe di ateuh â€˜arasy Mata uroe jak lom deungon buleuen Ban nyang Tuhan kheun hana meuubah Bandum nyan jijak watee ka teutap Tuhan Hadharat Neuato ceudah Neuato bandum Neupeutrang ayat Tayakin beu that meureumpok Allah Ngon Tuhan gata meureumpok dudoe
